title: Please Be Married
overview: Ye Xiange is a trainee at Linshan Entertainment. Before she officially debuted, she got into a big scandal planned by her own good friend, and her company decided to terminate the contract. While unemployed, Ye Senge met the heartless CEO of Su Group, Su Men, to do an internship at his company.Then an incredible thing happened: a five-year-old boy Su Zian came to Ye Xiang and said that he was her son from the future, and his father was Su Mucheng. Ye Xiang Ge was shocked. Su Mu Chen found out about it, and he had no choice but to live with them.Based on Manhua "I'm coming! Mom, where's my dad?"
